name: restaurant-intelligence-platform
description: Restaurant Intelligence Platform - Full Stack Application with Next.js Frontend and Node.js API Backend

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: Restaurant Intelligence Platform
